mapper.sql: `dept_id` AS `deptId`, `parent_id` AS `parentId`, `ancestors` AS `ancestors`, `dept_name` AS `deptName`, `order_num` AS `orderNum`, `leader` AS `leader`, `phone` AS `phone`, `email` AS `email`, `status` AS `status`, `del_flag` AS `delFlag`, `create_by` AS `createBy`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_by` AS `updateBy`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`
